name: Easy Slow Cooker Stroganoff
author: Starr
summary: Was in a hurry one day and threw this all together in the slow cooker. When I got home I was so surprised because it tastes like beef stroganoff made the hard way. So much simpler. I love this on a big piece of butter bread like an open-faced stroganoff sandwich.
ingredients: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans  cream of mushroom soup
3 pounds beef tips, cut into bite-size pieces
directions: Mix cream of mushroom soup, mushrooms, butter, and onion in a slow cooker; add beef tips
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook egg noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 5 minutes
Serve beef tips and sauce over cooked egg noodles
